Ferver Fermented Lactic Acid Exfoliating Tonic

Brand: Ferver

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), LACTIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, XANTHAN GUM, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM CARBONATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL.
